data.message: Hello,my messenger is little problem.I can not give message everyone.It shows sending failed & temporarily blocked.Did I something wrong??Pls help me

replies.message: Hey Exo. If you're temporarily blocked from sending messages, it may be because you've sent a lot of messages recently or your messages have been marked as unwelcome. This block is temporary and can last a few hours or a few days. You can learn more here: http://bit.ly/2wrWp2c. -Elizabeth
